<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add comment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/comment/{docId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add a Comment by (optionally) an Id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"docId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"String Id of the Comment"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"time":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date","type":"integer"},"text":{"description":"Comment text/message","type":"string"},"supporMarkdown":{"description":"Whether this comment supports markdown","type":"boolean"},"documentId":{"description":"Id of the object this comment belongs to","type":"string"},"collection":{"description":"Id of the collection this comments belongs to (Only accepted collection is \"frontHistory\")","type":"string"}},"title":"commentsPost"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
